meanings.definition: A plant of the stonecrop family with fleshy leaves and pink or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The orpines in the garden have vibrant pink flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted some orpines in my rock garden for a pop of color.
meanings.sent3: The orpines decided to have a flower party in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The orpines stood out like colorful jewels among the greenery.
meanings.sent5: The orpines looked like little pink stars scattered across the ground.

meanings.definition: A succulent plant used in rock gardens.
meanings.sent1: She carefully placed the orpines among the rocks in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The orpines added a touch of elegance to the rock garden.
meanings.sent3: The orpines whispered secrets to the neighboring plants.
meanings.sent4: The orpines were like tiny treasures hidden in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The orpines glistened in the sunlight, creating a beautiful scene.

meanings.definition: A perennial herb with thick, succulent leaves.
meanings.sent1: The orpines in the herb garden were thriving under the sun.
meanings.sent2: I love the way orpines look with their thick leaves.
meanings.sent3: The orpines played hide and seek with the other herbs.
meanings.sent4: The orpines stood tall and proud in the garden bed.
meanings.sent5: The orpines seemed to glow with life in the garden.
